mapper.insert: insert into route (routeId, routename, startprovince, startcity, middleprovince, middlecity, finalprovince, finalcity, tranprice, remarks) values (#{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update route set routename = #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startprovince = #{startprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startcity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middleprovince = #{middleprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middlecity = #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finalprovince = #{finalprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finalcity = #{finalcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tranprice = #{tranprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routeId = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select routeId, routename, startprovince, startcity, middleprovince, middlecity, finalprovince, finalcity, tranprice, remarks from route where routeId = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select routeId, routename, startprovince, startcity, middleprovince, middlecity, finalprovince, finalcity, tranprice, remarks from route
